tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Implant Fixing,Surgical Tooth Extraction,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review:
We went to Eledent Hospital in  KPHB colony for my wife's  dental implants.  We are in dilemma whether to go for Dental implants or not  but Doctor M.Ashok Kumar has clearly explained us the whole process and patiently listed to us and cleared all our doubts.  

He is very friendly and meticulously planned and fixed the dental implants for multiple teeth in few sittings and we are extremely happy with the professionalism and expertise of Doctor Ashok Kumar.

Thank you Doctor Ashok kumar and team  at Eledent Hospitals.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Zirconia Crowns,Dental Surgery,Implant Retained Dentures,Dental Fillings,
review:
I can confidently say Dr. Ashok ( ELEDENT HOSPITAL ) is one stop solution for all your Dental problems. My Father is suffering with several dental issues from last 10 Years, after thorough research we went to eledent hospital, with in 7 days all the dental problems (Implantations, Root canals, Crowns and Fillings) were fixed. 
Pros 
1. Understanding the exact problem and providing the correct solution.
2. Very less pain treatment and Sophisticated Equipment.
3. Treatment will be given  for all the ages and even for  patients having diabetes and B.P.
4. Doctors are friendly in nature and fees is moderate.

review: I visited Eledent International for my bleeding gums issue and met Dr. Ashok. He explained the root cause of my issue and suggested Deep Cleaning of my teeth and gums to resolve the issue. I underwent the deep cleaning and feel very satisfied with the treatment. My bleeding gum issue has resolved and my gums are looking pink and healthy. I recommend doctor Ashok and Eledent international for Dental issues.

review: I had damaged and broken teeth due to trauma... I approached eledent who gave me the belief to get my teeth look original by crowns fixation... A great place to go if you are looking for a dentist.
